alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Laclede; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:48PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Webster, Dallas, western Laclede, eastern Polk and northeastern Greene Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 848 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Urbana to 6 miles south of Buffalo to near Fair Grove. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennett Spring State Park, Marshfield, Buffalo, Fair Grove, Conway, Niangua, Phillipsburg, Halfway, Bennett Springs, Louisburg, Windyville, Elkland, Leadmine, March, Pumpkin Center, Olive, Foose, Goodson, Plad and Long Lane. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 98 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and southwestern Missouri.
